Summary: i saw something that was as big as a football field n didn't make a sound. it came down n i got pics.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Gladstone

divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving down the road n all of a sudden it's like I was drawn to it. It was as big as a football field n it didn't make a sound. It was cigar shapedcame down. I KNOW IT WAS THE MOST LIFE CHANGING EXPERIENCE ONE COULD HAVE. PS I gota GREAT PICTURE but big brothermite not like me showing it. All n all it made no noise. A football field sized cigar HELLO PEOPLE WTF.WTF
